game_description: Prancing through the vast Central Continent, through the blockade of undead hordes, bandits and rebels, helping the lords deliver letters, supplies or legendary weapons as fast as possible! Whether it's low shrubs, dry deserts, vast meadows, or rugged mountains, mount a different legendary horse and set out on a journey with your friends. Visit a cliff fortress in a confrontation, a fortified fortress on a steppe, a grand town at the confluence of rivers, or experience an adventure to and from the Dragon's Lair and become a hero on horseback.
review_1: This is the start of a very fun game. However, some of the motions didn't work when I tried them. Example, the horse would not jump even though I mimicked the movements shown. When I moved the horse forward I ended up with a big icon/logo of the game and that was it. There needs to be an easily accessible tutorial the controls need to work better & the demo should reflect more gameplay.
review_2: Is there anything else to say? Can't wait for full release on the app
review_3: The game is ok but you need to come up with a new one
